Description: Reverend Pete Anderson Custom Condition: This Pete Anderson Custom Hollow Body is in excellent condition. Serial Number: 30183 Weight: 7.45lbs The PA-1 HB Custom was designed in collaboration with Pete Anderson himself, a country-roots rock musician and Grammy winning artist/producer. Now loaded with Classic H humbuckers, this guitar delivers smooth, thick tone. The artist wanted a classic hollow body look, but with the ability to play at higher volumes without uncontrollable feedback. Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Laminated maple back/sides, laminated spruce top Body Color/Finish: Satin Deep Sea Blue Neck Wood: Three-piece korina Neck Profile: Medium Oval Neck Radius: 12" Fingerboard: Ebony Fingerboard Inlays: Blocks Frets: 22 Medium Jumbo Nut Width: 1-11/16" Tuners: Reverend Pin-Lock Scale Length: 24.75" Bridge: Bigsby B-70 with roller bridge Pickups: Classic H bridge, Classic H neck Controls: Volume, Tone, Bass Contour, 3-Way Hardware Finish: Chrome Case: Reverend H Case Included Country Of Origin: South Korea Switching: 3-way pickup switch: P1 - Bridge Pickup P2 - Bridge and Neck Pickup P3 - Neck Pickup
Title: Reverend Pete Anderson PA-1 HB Custom Hollow Body - Satin Deep Sea Blue Preowned
